ygData.subject: Re: Armour
ygData.msgSnippet: Answers below as usual... ... From: Entreri Hi ppl, Need help again![Whats new? :P] ... Since I am playing a warrior,Do u think I should skip buying cloth
ygData.messageBody:
Answers below as usual...
---- Original Message -----
From: Entreri

Hi ppl,
Need help again![Whats new? :P]

>>Who doesn't need help? We are all new unless you hit LvL 50 already....

Since I am playing a warrior,Do u think I should skip buying cloth armour and save for leather instead?Heres my plan on buying stuff ,plz sent any comments or opinions

>>Just stick to PatchWork Armour. Costs about 2pp a full suit so its darn cheap. Later in the game then slowly upgrade. I started off with PW too then slowly change to cloth <monk>. From cloth tunic to Snakeskin, from cap to Headband etc. You get my point right? But seriously, I'd just save money for a combine weapon first. Then get a full suit of banded. Then a well-balanced long sword ;-)

>>Wilson aka Yutaka
